text:
The Bellas are back!

ET has your exclusive first look at season two of Total Bellas, which promises to bring the drama -- big time. The new season features a lot of life changes for sisters Nikki and Brie and their men, John Cena and Daniel Bryan. Season two will document a big move to Phoenix, Brie’s pregnancy and Nikki’s surprise engagement.



WATCH: ET Goes Wedding Dress Shopping With Nikki Bella!



Total Bellas returns this fall with all-new episodes, but first you can check out the season finale of Total Divas on Wednesday night at 9 p.m. ET/PT on E!

ET was with Nikki and John just a couple of weeks ago at the premiere of John’s new movie, The Wall. For the latest on their wedding plans, watch our interview below.
title: EXCLUSIVE: 'Total Bellas' Is Back With Big Changes for Nikki and Brie! Get Your First Look at Season 2

meta_data.description: The hit 'Total Divas' spinoff returns this fall.
